name: Pull Me Out
description:
After the performance of the next special operation, you returned to the base. Your helicopter was hit and you falldown an emergency evacuation in an losted city. You must survive in a city full of zombies. Collect weapons in hidden places marked on the radar. Use different weapons to destroy: a knife, a bow, a pistol, a shotgun, a rifle.

3D First person shooter. Survival. Zombies and weapons.
Several levels of the game and the change of day - this is all to destroy all the zombies around.
